text:
Hi <@UCH1L597V>, thanks for you response.

Yes, I'm talking about quotes.

The thing is, that our customer would like the percentage field in the quote to be prefilled, when selecting specific products from the catalogue. I guess using calculated properties won't lead to the desired solution. Right?
you can create custom field in products but you need to fill that field while creating product or you need to build an app and using your logic you can do that programatically.
or you can use custom quote template feature where you can store your logic in json file and while listing the products you can do that.

Morning!

Is there a way to add tags to blog posts in bulk? eg we want to add 'media' tag to approx 200 posts.
See the result on 590px screen width
